notablefor=helping rescue [[Frodo]] and [[Sam]] from the eruptions of [[Orodruin]]
Eagle]] of the northern mountains, one of the followers of [[Gwaihir
column3: Gwaihir the Windlord]]. He was among the squadron of Eagles who flew to the aid of the [[Captains of the West]] in the last desperate battle before the [[Gate of Mordor]]. With his lord Gwaihir, and Gwaihir's brother [[Landroval]], he flew into the [[Mordor
column4: Black Land]] to the rescue of [[Frodo Baggins
column6: Sam]], and carried one of these two (we are not told which) out of the destruction of [[Mount Doom]].<ref>{{RK

column1: The first element of his name ''[[menel]]'' is both a [[Sindarin]] and [[Quenya]] word meaning "the heavens".<ref>{{PE
'''2003: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'':'''
:[http://lotrtcgwiki.com/wiki/lotr17022 A card] in [[Decipher]]'s [[The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game]] confirms one of the eagles that rescued Frodo and Sam was Meneldor.
